Home page.title: Click ‘Angiogram’ to explore fluoroscopy and fluoroscopic image.
subtitle: Select step by step to see desired image
Click ‘submit’ to see fluoroscopic image. Fluoroscopic image and information will show on the screen.

Home page.title: Click ‘Coronary arteries’ to explore cardiac vessel anatomy. Model of cardiac vessel will demonstrate with the vessel's name tag.
subtitle: Click the interested name tag ; such as LCx.
The fluoroscopy image and necessary information of the selected-vessel will show on the screen.
Click ‘back’ to explore other vessel.
There are three model following each dominant that is Right, Left, and Co dominant. Click on the interested dominant at menu bar aboce the model.

Home page.title: Click ‘3D Model Viewer’ bar at the left upper corner for a shortcut keys to go on other page without back to the home page.
Click ‘About us’ to see more information and contact of the organizer.

AR Mode.title: Download this picture on your another device.
Open AR Mode and put a marker in front of the camera for model detection.
